holidays.title: Declaration of Malacca as a Historical City
holidays.description: Today commemorates 500 years of business and cultural exchange between the straits of Malacca.

holidays.title: Father Damien Day
holidays.description: Commemorate Father Damien and his deeds, and give help to people in need.

holidays.title: International Microvolunteering Day
holidays.description: Raise awareness about micro-volunteering so that people can join forces on this day.

holidays.title: Jackie Robinson Day
holidays.description: Let’s watch the ‘50s Dodger highlights as we gather to celebrate the great Jackie Robinson.

holidays.title: McDonald's Day
holidays.description: Get your cash, go to the nearest McDonald’s, and get in line to order.

holidays.title: National Anime Day
holidays.description: Share your exciting anime experiences with other fans around the world this National Anime Day.

holidays.title: National ASL Day
holidays.description: American Sign Language is an inclusive language for the Deaf and mute.

holidays.title: National Banana Day
holidays.description: What an amazing time to celebrate the awesomeness of the world’s most popular fruit — the banana!

holidays.title: National Glazed Spiral Ham Day
holidays.description: We hope you have your appetites ready, we’re learning more about National Glazed Spiral Ham Day!

holidays.title: National Griper's Day
holidays.description: On this special day, get ready to complain as you’ve never done before.

holidays.title: National Keaton Day
holidays.description: It’s a unique national holiday honoring the Keaton and Keaton families worldwide.

holidays.title: National Rubber Eraser Day
holidays.description: To all the rubber erasers in the world — thank you for correcting our mistakes!

holidays.title: National That Sucks Day
holidays.description: It’s okay to wear a long face on this day because it’s “That Sucks” Day!

holidays.title: One Boston Day
holidays.description: Gather the wreaths and roses; it’s time to observe One Boston Day!

holidays.title: Purple Up Day
holidays.description: Purple Up Day is a special holiday that recognizes the contributions of military children.

holidays.title: Take A Wild Guess Day
holidays.description: Listen to your instinct and join us to celebrate National Take a Wild Guess Day!

holidays.title: Titanic Remembrance Day
holidays.description: Prepare yourselves as we remember and honor the lives lost to the Titanic ship disaster.

holidays.title: Type 1 Diabetes Day in Honor of Jakya Monique Furtick
holidays.description: In honor of Jakya, let us focus on this disease that is incurable but treatable.

holidays.title: Universal Day of Culture
holidays.description: It’s a day to celebrate cultures from around the world and preserve our traditions.

holidays.title: World Art Day
holidays.description: World Art Day is a colorful holiday that encourages curiosity about the beautiful things around us.

holidays.title: Youth Homelessness Matters Day
holidays.description: Let’s raise awareness to support the youth experiencing or at risk of homelessness.

holidays.title: Emma Watson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actress is also a Goodwill Ambassador advocating for women's rights.

holidays.title: Jacquees’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this artist who taught himself how to sing and is now making huge waves!

holidays.title: Leonardo da Vinci’s Birthday
holidays.description: Artist, humanist, scientist, philosopher, inventor, naturalist — Leonardo da Vinci is truly a legend

holidays.title: Seth Rogen’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s appreciate what Seth Rogen achieved in his career as we celebrate his birthday.
